message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $900000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $850000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $750000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $825000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your concession, but $825000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $775000, and that's my final offer. I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to make a final offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $775000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $820000, and that's as low as I can go. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're making a last concession, but $820000 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $785000, and that's my final offer. I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.

I've made multiple concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $800000, but I'm not budging from that price. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll accept it. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
